author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
Of mighty Charles, the third of name,
A king's ascension, all shall claim,
A coronation, ancient rite,
Herald the monarch's birthright's might.

His treasury, a bulging purse,
Inheriting the realm's diverse,
From farmlands green to city-spires,
Endowed with riches, he acquires.

Wondrous tools of art and skill,
Designed to find, against their will,
Celestial dwellers of yon sphere,
Fall silent, none but us to hear.

feedItems.title: King Charles III's Coronation to Draw Global Audience for Lavish Ceremony
feedItems.description: The coronation ceremony dates back 1,000 years, a throwback to a bygone age when all-powerful monarchs dictated the fates of nations.

feedItems.title: King Charles Inherits Bulging Royal Purse Thanks to Property Boom
feedItems.description: Behind the royal wealth is a booming real-estate portfolio of bucolic farms, wholesale warehouses and prime London offices that has helped cover a royal spending spree.

feedItems.title: Will Powerful New Tools FinallyLet Us Hear Alien Civilizations?
feedItems.description: The most powerful effort yet to find extraterrestrial life is searching for beings that may not want to be found.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
Of Vice's frightening fate we heard,
In bankruptcy's grip like snared bird;
Yet lenders' sweet deal,
To their wounds they do heal.

A plump rabbit, Jenny Craig was named,
In weight loss, her glory proclaimed;
But alas, she must leave,
To her end, we do grieve.

Wagner, the wolf of Russian lore,
His troops brought to Ukraine's fierce shore;
But his pack, tattered and torn,
From the front, now withdrawn.

feedItems.title: Vice Media is nearing a deal for senior lenders to acquire it out of bankruptcy, according to people familiar with the matter.
feedItems.description: Vice Media is nearing a deal for senior lenders to acquire it out of bankruptcy, according to people familiar with the matter.

feedItems.title: Weight-loss brand Jenny Craig said that it is going out of business.
feedItems.description: Weight-loss brand Jenny Craig said that it is going out of business.

feedItems.title: The leader of Russian paramilitary group Wagner threatened to withdraw his troops from the front line in Ukraine, citing growing losses, in a move that raises fresh tensions between Moscow's military leaders ahead of an expected offensive by Kyiv.
feedItems.description: The leader of Russian paramilitary group Wagner threatened to withdraw his troops from the front line in Ukraine, citing growing losses, in a move that raises fresh tensions between Moscow’s military leaders ahead of an expected offensive by Kyiv.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
In Hong Kong, a statue stood with grace,
Of Tiananmen's dark mem'ry in place,
Seized by the law's hand, sculptor dismayed,
The tale of a nation's past, it portrayed.

In times of great strife, Our Lord hath decreed,
End to the plague of Covid-19,
As we praise, and take God's thankful reprieve,
Our wine gratefully filled, in relief, we believe.

Of tales and kingdoms on streams we doth learn,
Warner Bros. Discovery, their fortunes shall turn,
In two thousand and three and twenty, they say,
A year early, to profit they're well on their way.

feedItems.title: A statue in Hong Kong commemorating the Tiananmen massacre was seized by police, the sculptor said.
feedItems.description: A statue in Hong Kong commemorating the Tiananmen massacre was seized by police, the sculptor said.

feedItems.title: The WHO declared an end to the Covid-19 emergency, signaling that one of the most deadly and economically devastating pandemics in modern history is receding as the disease that caused it becomes a routine illness.
feedItems.description: The WHO declared an end to the Covid-19 emergency, signaling that one of the most deadly and economically devastating pandemics in modern history is receding as the disease that caused it becomes a routine illness.

feedItems.title: Warner Bros. Discovery's direct-to-consumer streaming platforms will be profitable in 2023, a year earlier than projected, the company said.
feedItems.description: Warner Bros. Discovery’s direct-to-consumer streaming platforms will be profitable in 2023, a year earlier than projected, the company said.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
In June, fair Walensky doth retire,
As health emergency, we nigh quench fire;
The dragon of Covid, our foe does wane,
With careful steps, we seek peace to regain.

When rallying stocks did e'en cap our grief,
U.S. markets soared, granting sweet relief;
The S&P, Nasdaq, and Dow climbed high,
In unity, they reached to touch the sky.

Underneath storm, the banks doth find their rest,
Surging forth to regain, true strength their quest;
Yet some bear losses at the week's dark end,
Hefty and wounded, they strive wounds to mend.

feedItems.title: Walensky will be stepping down as director of the CDC in June, the agency said, as the Biden administration prepares to end the national health emergency around Covid-19 next week.
feedItems.description: Walensky will be stepping down as director of the CDC in June, the agency said, as the Biden administration prepares to end the national health emergency around Covid-19 next week.

feedItems.title: U.S. stocks rallied following the jobs report, capping a tumultuous week. The S&P 500, Nasdaq and Dow gained 1.8%, 2.2% and 1.7%, respectively.
feedItems.description: U.S. stocks rallied following the jobs report, capping a tumultuous week. The S&P 500, Nasdaq and Dow gained 1.8%, 2.2% and 1.7%, respectively.

feedItems.title: Shares of under-fire regional banks surged to recover some lost ground, though many still ended the week nursing hefty losses.
feedItems.description: Shares of under-fire regional banks surged to recover some lost ground, though many still ended the week nursing hefty losses.
